physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#1182, 1970s Soviet Jewry Rally, Denver.''

mods.abstract: A group of unidentified men, women, and children sit in a semi-circle in front of the state capital listening to a man seated near the camera and speaking into a megaphone during a Soviet Jewry Rally. The audience members each have papers they are reading.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
